Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that beating Bongo Bongo quickly requires an even tempo.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: ${12 68 79}They say that monarchy is a terrible system of governance.
